Html:
I have to say that i really love the program. I even am estatic that i can now load a war up to compare his mitigation to mine. The only thing i would like to see added to the feral options. Is to be able to change talents and see how that affects mitigation and armor.

I would like to see how maybe droping a point in thick hide would help mitigation.

Well, that's too low priority to happen any time soon, ferals are just so cookie cutter. But what you can do if you want to see how dropping a point in Thick Hide would affect you, and you are able to edit xml, is edit BuffCache.xml and add a new buff. In the <Stats> tag, use <BonusArmorMultiplier>-0.027272727</BonusArmorMultiplier>. That'll be give you a -2.727272% armor debuff, which is almost the same. It's not quite right, cause Thick Hide doesn't affect armor from agility, but it's decently close.
